title: Remove heals of some champs
body:
Currently champions that heal are 

Alistar - Nice heal mabey scale off max health as well?

Bard - nice heal has to be used strategically 

Janna - good disengage

Kayle - good disengage and for winning 1  v 1s 

Nami - very appropriate on her allows her to heal an ally and poke at the same time 

Nidalee - Needs to be removes. She has extremely good poke and does not allow for counter play. Possibly nerf spear and give her another damage ability because her spear chunks me for 3 / 4 health at time and my poke is negated.

Shen - have not played alot vsing shen but seems fine to me 

Sona - Complements her utility dense kit.

Soraka - LoL' s healer, very strong yet balanced 

Taric - prefer sheild since he is helping other champions tank. Also possibly attack steroid.

replies.body:
I knew this was a nidalee hate article just from the title ;) 

Anyone else see a bit of bias here?

shes sooooooooooo annoying ffs she just chunks half my life with her spears who else does that ?
it is easy to avoid though lol.

tarics heal should be removed because i dont feel he is the type of champ to heal.

other champs heals are pretty fine.

Haha - just don't beat around the bush next time, the title should be 'nerf nidalee' :P

It's not too difficult to dodge though, the last two nidalees I fought probably landed one spear between them, and that's over two separate games! 
That and magic resist for those times you don't manage to dodge it are the counters. Plus nidalee is extremely squishy, and her new cougar combo is pretty dependant on her landing those spears to maximise her damage output. I like that Taric's heal is strongest when used on allies, but I've never found it to be particularly unbalanced. Combined with his armour passives it makes for a decent kit. 

If I had to question any of the heals in the game it would probably be that of Sona. Frequent heals and shields supported by mana regen (or a tear) and some CDR makes for pretty stale gameplay. Yeah, she's squishy but she's also pretty quick, has quite a lot of damage on her Q (people are still building sheens and whatnot for sudden burst damage) and a group stun if she gets in trouble. Nidalee may have a heal and a fair bit of burst damage but her main source of poke is a slow skillshot and she has no crowd-control.
